document_data.name: Cloak of Shadows
document_data.deity: [[Abbathor]], [[Aerdrie Faenya]], [[Asmodeus]], [[Baravar Cloakshadow]], [[Beshaba]], [[Brandobaris]], [[Cyric]], [[Erevan Ilesere]], [[Fenmarel Mestarine]], [[Garl Glittergold]], [[Leira]], [[Lolth]], [[Marthammor Duin]], [[Mask]], [[Nebelun]], [[Shar]], [[Shargaas]], [[Tymora]], [[Vergadain]], [[Vhaeraun]], [[Waukeen]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Cloak of shadows''''' was a ''[[channel divinity]]'' power granted to [[cleric]]s of the [[Trickery domain]].
document_data.Effects: A cleric with the Trickery domain could turn invisible until he or she attacked or cast a spell.
document_data.Components: Only the cleric's skill was needed to evoke this power.
